mapper.select: select USERID, USERNAME, AGE, PHONE, currencyone, countone, currencytwo, counttwo, to_char(createtime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createtime, to_char(updatetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as updatetime from testbatch where USERID >= #{beginId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and USERID <= #{endId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO testbatch (userid, username, age, phone,currencyone,countone,currencytwo,counttwo,createtime,updatetime) VALUES (#{item.userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.age,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.currencyOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countOne,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.currencyTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.countTwo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_date(#{item.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), sysdate);
